p: AutoDock Vina [ 34] was used to perform the molecular docking of energy-minimized 3D structures of ligands with energy-minimized structure of target proteins. Accordingly, the 3D structures of prepared ligands in .pdb format were converted to .pdbqt format using the python script prepare_ligand4.py from AutoDockTools [ 78]. Similarly, the energy-minimized structure of TMPRSS2 and cathepsin L in .pdb format were converted to .pdbqt format using the python script prepare_receptor4.py from AutoDockTools [ 78].
